title: Embroidery Sample, ca. 1790–1800
medium:
Medium: silk, metal wire, foil, sequins, glass and paper
Technique: embroidered on cut and voided supplementary warp pile (velvet)
creditline: Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund
description: Floral design embroidered with silver and gold wire, gold and green and blue sequins, foil and bits of clear glass on a black and purple ground of small vertical zigzags.

tombstone.epitaph:
Embroidery Sample, ca. 1790–1800.
ca. 1790–1800. Medium: silk, metal wire, foil, sequins, glass and paper
Technique: embroidered on cut and voided supplementary warp pile (velvet). Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund. 1932-1-48.
